title: AI Mindmap Extension
author: Wood Peng
excerpt: An AI-powered whiteboard for limitless brainstorming and mind mapping. Integrate GPT-4 & Claude, break down complex ideas, expand your thinking, unlock your creative potential. With just one click, transform your ideas into polished PPT and engaging articles.
